parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.04

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Multiplayer

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Forces unit to respawn. The effect as if the player pressed RESPAWN button in the game pause menu, the unit is killed only there is no "so and so was killed" message and no score adjustment.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''forceRespawn''' unit

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[forceRespawn]] [[player]];
</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[playerRespawnTime]], [[setPlayerRespawnTime]]
</value></part></template></root>
